## PublishingTarget type

Abstract base class for classes that represent a target for publishing: Target Type and Publication Target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PublishingTarget = SystemWideObject & {
    Description?: string;
};
```

**References:** [SystemWideObject](./open-api-client.systemwideobject.md)
